demos.text: Men always needs a beautiful, intelligent, caring, loving, adjustable, cooperative wife. But the law allows only one wife....

signature.instructions: Analyze the provided text message and determine whether it is classified as "ham" (non-spam) or "spam" based on its content and contextual features.

fields.description: whether a text message is legitimate (ham) or spam
